ts_data

Source: vignettes/ts_data.Rmd
ts_data.Rmd

DAL Package 

library(dal)
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'FNN::knn.cv' by 'class::knn.cv' when

#> loading 'dal'

#> loading 'dal'

x <- seq(0, 10, 0.25)
y <- sin(x)

plot(x, y)
lines(x, y)

data <- ts_data(y)
head.ts_data(data)
#>             t0
#> [1,] 0.0000000
#> [2,] 0.2474040
#> [3,] 0.4794255
#> [4,] 0.6816388
#> [5,] 0.8414710
#> [6,] 0.9489846
plot(data)

data10 <- ts_data(y, 10)
head.ts_data(data10)
#>             t9        t8        t7        t6        t5        t4        t3
#> [1,] 0.0000000 0.2474040 0.4794255 0.6816388 0.8414710 0.9489846 0.9974950
#> [2,] 0.2474040 0.4794255 0.6816388 0.8414710 0.9489846 0.9974950 0.9839859
#> [3,] 0.4794255 0.6816388 0.8414710 0.9489846 0.9974950 0.9839859 0.9092974
#> [4,] 0.6816388 0.8414710 0.9489846 0.9974950 0.9839859 0.9092974 0.7780732
#> [5,] 0.8414710 0.9489846 0.9974950 0.9839859 0.9092974 0.7780732 0.5984721
#> [6,] 0.9489846 0.9974950 0.9839859 0.9092974 0.7780732 0.5984721 0.3816610
#>             t2         t1         t0
#> [1,] 0.9839859  0.9092974  0.7780732
#> [2,] 0.9092974  0.7780732  0.5984721
#> [3,] 0.7780732  0.5984721  0.3816610

#> [5,] 0.3816610  0.1411200 -0.1081951
#> [6,] 0.1411200 -0.1081951 -0.3507832
r1 <- data10[12,]
r1
#>            t9      t8         t7         t6         t5         t4         t3
#> [1,] 0.381661 0.14112 -0.1081951 -0.3507832 -0.5715613 -0.7568025 -0.8949894
#>              t2         t1         t0
#> [1,] -0.9775301 -0.9992928 -0.9589243

#> [1] 10
r2 <- data10[12:13,]
r2
#>            t9         t8         t7         t6         t5         t4         t3
#> [1,] 0.381661  0.1411200 -0.1081951 -0.3507832 -0.5715613 -0.7568025 -0.8949894
#> [2,] 0.141120 -0.1081951 -0.3507832 -0.5715613 -0.7568025 -0.8949894 -0.9775301

#> [2,] -0.9992928 -0.9589243 -0.8589345

#> [1] "ts_data" "matrix"  "array"  
#> attr(,"sw")
#> [1] 10
c1 <- data10[,1]
head.ts_data(c1)
#>             t9
#> [1,] 0.0000000
#> [2,] 0.2474040
#> [3,] 0.4794255

#> [2,] 0.2474040 0.4794255

rc2

rc3
